snippet.title: Hazy Days Trailer | A Breathing Simulator Set in China
snippet.description:
Download for PC/Mac at http://bit.ly/hazydaysgame

Please help me get on Steam!
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=869098658

The game follows Xiao Feng, a young girl who is about to visit her Grandmother for Chinese New Year. Over the course of seven days, players control her breathing as she faces increasing levels of pollution in the city.

I've been living in China for over a year now and while the city is great, the air pollution is a real issue that people deal with on a day-to-day basis. I made Hazy Day based on my own personal experiences and I hope that it can help put into perspective what it feels like to breath in smog.
